column1: #Text=" Zuko says : " I 've spent years preparing for this encounter .
#Text=" Aang says : " Well , you 're just a teenager .
#Text=" Aang says : " If I go with you , will you promise to leave everyone alone ?
#Text=" Aang says : " Do n't worry , Katara .
#Text=Take care of Appa for me until I get back .
#Text=" Zuko says : " Head a course for the Fire Nation .
